name: 2025 Discmania Challenge Presented by TruBank Gold

liveLayoutDetails.notes:
OB: White rope line left, right, surrounding green and beyond. 

HAZARD:  Marked triangular area separating fairway from green. 

CASUAL AREA: Area marked in red near basket. (806.03). 

MANDATORIES: Discs must not enter restricted plane left of marked pole and marked tree along parking lot, or right of marked tree in fairway. If any MANDO is missed, proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. 

NOTE: DZ is used for MISSED MANDO ONLY. After any throwing coming to rest OB that hasn't missed the MANDO, standard OB rules apply.

OB:  Marked white rope lines and beyond.
DROP ZONE:  After any tee shot landing OB, player must proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. 
Standard OB rules apply on all subsequent throws.

OB:  Pond area marked by white rope line.
NOTE:  Player may take casual relief from any standing water outside of marked OB pond 
area.

OB:  Pond area marked by white rope line; Rope line left/long of 
the green areas and beyond. DROP ZONE:  After any tee shot landing OB, player must 
proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. Standard OB rules apply on all subsequent throws.

OB:  All area outside of marked ISLAND GREEN.

DROP ZONE:  Tee shots must come to rest safe on the ISLAND GREEN to mark a lie on the 
island. After any tee shot landing OB, player must proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. Standard OB rules apply on all subsequent throws.

NOTE:  MPO DZ is the FPO tee.
OB:  White rope line left, encircling the green and beyond.

OB:  Fence along road long and beyond.

HAZARD:  All area outside of marked hexagonal landscape feature short of the fence along 
the road.
OB:  Rope line left and beyond; Rope line along creek long and beyond.
OB:  Rope lines left, right and beyond; Rope line behind pin and beyond.

OB:  Rope line left, right and beyond; Marked creek area separating the MPO green from 
the fairway.

OB:  Marked area right of DZ.

MANDATORY:  Discs must not enter restricted plane left of marked pole. If MANDO is missed, proceed to DZ (old FPO tee) +1 penalty throw.

DROP ZONE:  Discs must not enter restricted plane left of marked pole. If MANDO is missed, 
proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw.

NOTE:  The DZ is for MISSED MANDO ONLY. After any throw coming to rest OB that hasn't 
missed the MANDO, standard OB rules apply. Player may take casual relief from any 
standing water outside of marked OB area.

OB:  Marked creek area in fairway; Marked creek bed right.

DOUBLE MANDATORY:  Discs must not enter restricted planes to the outside of marked trees. If DOUBLE MANDO is missed, proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. 

DROP ZONE:  After any throw from the tee coming to rest OB, player must proceed to DZ +1 
penalty throw. Standard OB rules apply on all subsequent throws.

NOTE:  The same DZ is used for missed mando and OB throws 
from the tee.
OB:  Marked creek bed right/long and beyond.
OB: Marked line along creek crossing the fairway and beyond, excluding the marked safe island green.
OB: Rope line right, and beyond

OB: Rope line, left, right, and beyond. 

Drop Zone: Tee box is an island surrounded by OB. After any throw from the tee coming to rest OB, player may proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw. (If a throw from the tee never crossed in-bounds, player must re-tee.) Standard OB rules apply.

OB: Rope line left, right, encircling fairway and beyond, excluding marked safe ISLAND GREEN. 

DROP ZONE; Any throw from the fairway must come to rest safe on the ISLAND GREEN to abe able to mark on the island. After any throw from the tee or fairway coming to rest OB, player must proceed to DZ1 + ! penalty throw. After any throw from DZ1 coming to rest OB, player must proceed to DZ2 +1 penalty throw. Standard OB rules apply to all throws from DZ2 and the safe ISLAND GREEN

OB: Marked lines left, encircling green and beyond: island green of hole 5. 

MANDATORY: Discs must not enter restricted plane right of marked tree. If MANDO is missed, proceed to DZ +1 penalty throw.
